scripts.start:01-rsc: E2E_RSC_ENABLED=1 E2E_ROUTER_JS_ENGINE=hermes E2E_CANARY_ENABLED=1 EXPO_USE_STATIC=server E2E_ROUTER_SRC=01-rsc expo start
scripts.export:01-rsc: E2E_RSC_ENABLED=1 E2E_ROUTER_JS_ENGINE=hermes E2E_CANARY_ENABLED=1 EXPO_USE_STATIC=server E2E_ROUTER_SRC=01-rsc expo export
scripts.start:02-server-actions: E2E_SERVER_FUNCTIONS=1 E2E_RSC_ENABLED=1 E2E_ROUTER_JS_ENGINE=hermes EXPO_USE_METRO_REQUIRE=1 E2E_CANARY_ENABLED=1 EXPO_USE_STATIC=server E2E_ROUTER_SRC=02-server-actions expo start
scripts.export:02-server-actions: E2E_SERVER_FUNCTIONS=1 E2E_RSC_ENABLED=1 E2E_ROUTER_JS_ENGINE=hermes EXPO_USE_METRO_REQUIRE=1 E2E_CANARY_ENABLED=1 EXPO_USE_STATIC=server E2E_ROUTER_SRC=02-server-actions expo export
scripts.start:03-server-actions-only: E2E_SERVER_FUNCTIONS=1 E2E_ROUTER_JS_ENGINE=hermes EXPO_USE_METRO_REQUIRE=1 E2E_CANARY_ENABLED=1 EXPO_USE_STATIC=single E2E_ROUTER_SRC=03-server-actions-only expo start
scripts.export:03-server-actions-only: E2E_SERVER_FUNCTIONS=1 E2E_ROUTER_JS_ENGINE=hermes EXPO_USE_METRO_REQUIRE=1 E2E_CANARY_ENABLED=1 EXPO_USE_STATIC=single E2E_ROUTER_SRC=03-server-actions-only expo export
scripts.start:04-server-error-boundaries: E2E_SERVER_FUNCTIONS=1 E2E_ROUTER_JS_ENGINE=hermes EXPO_USE_METRO_REQUIRE=1 E2E_CANARY_ENABLED=1 EXPO_USE_STATIC=single E2E_ROUTER_SRC=04-server-error-boundaries expo start
scripts.export:04-server-error-boundaries: E2E_SERVER_FUNCTIONS=1 E2E_ROUTER_JS_ENGINE=hermes EXPO_USE_METRO_REQUIRE=1 E2E_CANARY_ENABLED=1 EXPO_USE_STATIC=single E2E_ROUTER_SRC=04-server-error-boundaries expo export
scripts.export:web-workers: E2E_ROUTER_ASYNC=true E2E_ROUTER_SRC=web-workers EXPO_USE_STATIC=single expo export -p web
scripts.open:universal-linking: xcrun simctl terminate booted com.expo.routere2e && npx uri-scheme open https://expo-e2e-universal-linking.ngrok.io/post/123 --ios
scripts.export:vaul: E2E_ROUTER_SRC=vaul-modal E2E_ROUTER_JS_ENGINE=hermes EXPO_WEB_DEV_HYDRATE=1 expo export --platform web
scripts.start:vaul-modal: E2E_ROUTER_SRC=vaul-modal E2E_ROUTER_JS_ENGINE=hermes E2E_CANARY_ENABLED=1 EXPO_USE_METRO_REQUIRE=1 expo start -p web
scripts.start:fast-refresh: E2E_ROUTER_SRC=fast-refresh E2E_ROUTER_JS_ENGINE=hermes E2E_CANARY_ENABLED=1 EXPO_USE_METRO_REQUIRE=1 expo start -p web
